Tech to Empower

Technology Creates Opportunity

Donate Today

About Us

Tech to Empower is a non-profit organization founded by three seniors from Flower Mound High School. We collect donations of old technology, and use monetary donations to purchase used chromebooks. We then distribute these donations to local causes that benefit from tech donations.

Privacy Policy Terms of Use

Monetary Donation

Paypal

We accept monetary donations through PayPal, debit card, or credit card. If you would like to donate through cash or check, contact us.

Paypal

Technology Donations

Laptops, Tablets, Phones, and prepaid internet devices

If you have an old laptop, tablet, or phone in usable condition and are not sure what to do with it, consider donating it to Tech to Empower. For technology donations, we can either come to you to collect your donation or meet halfway, depending on your location.

Tech Donation
